DescriptionTake on an important leadership role in a world-class health organization. Drive innovative data processes that support exceptional patient care. Take your professional expertise to the next level. You can do all this and more at UCLA Health. You will manage a team of business intelligence analysts as they provide quality and performance ranking data support to system-level performance improvement projects. You will ensure data accuracy, team efficiency, and on-time delivery of analytical findings while keeping the Chief of Analytics apprised of work status and issues to be resolved. You will: Define staff goals, strategies, project plans, timelines, and performance metrics Collaborate with department leaders and business owners to gather data and reporting requirements Deliver advanced data analysis using Tableau, SAS, R, SQL, Python, Excel, Access, etc. Perform quality assurance and validation on data/deliverables Manage the workspace to ensure data completion and data accuracy Serve as the technical lead for cross-training and data quality review Assure the maximum use of technology to promote efficient work systems Salary range: $98700.00-$244500.00 Annual
